data.message: Why get into Politics?Trump hasn't said anything worse than what you've rapped about.Dont be a dam hypocrite! (AND btw this is coming from a lifelong Eminem fan)

replies.message: Agree
https://youtu.be/gY-67ba1VH0 indeed.
Probably because he hates Trump and wants to voice it
Get into politics? Have you listened to any of his music?
100% agree
Em has been rapping about politics for a long time
He didn't say one thing about Obama only bush lol.
Dude, he flipflopped. No tax reform, no repeal, no middle east peace...
White America
I see someone never heard white America, mosh, we are Americans yet, swear you're an eminem fan
He doesn't rap for president's 😉
He's talked shit on every president except Obuma. 😂😂😂 Wouldn't want to piss off his 12 black fans. He's just jumping on the fucktrump bandwagon for more money like all the "celebrities".
You sound like a bitch not no damn life long Stan 😭😂
You're not an Eminem fan if you're telling him to stay out of politics
Id rather see the president d*** its never been said but i set precedence

I may be from Kenya but i know the difference between a rapper and a president and if you compare eminem's dirty lyrics as a rapper and we all know how crazy they are to statements made by the US president then that tells you alot about how bad mouthed trump is but hey i'm not from US haha

He says fuck bush
Disses Obama and fuck trump
See the pattern
https://youtu.be/OTtxnAYDr_A

'Trump hasn't said anything worse than you'

Yeah the difference is that one's a famously offensive rapper, the other is the president of the United fucking states. Get some perspective!
Eminem Even voted for obama :P

Bruhh  " lifelong Eminem fan" but doesnt even know that Eminem been rapping about politics forever he rapped about Hillary bush etc talking about trump isnt new you are a fake ass fan buddy and just because hes a rapper doesnt mean he cant have his own opinion about something/someone so FUCK YOU🖕🏻🖕🏻 don't call yourself a " lifelong" Eminem fan because your ass isnt and same goes for everyone else who say shit like that because you think Eminem dissing trump is a new thing or him getting into politics then your ass isnt a true fan so ya fuck you 🖕🏻
Marshall talks about what he thinks it's important to talk about, if he does not agree with something he'll say that's the duty of the artist and rapper Tupac once said rap is political
No nigga u ain't no Eminem fan !!a Stan wouldn't say Marshall is a hypocrite u stupid shit

Actually, I'm going to tell you something, you listen to real rap, you know what rap was created for? It was created to express people's feelings about the injustices committed by the government, rap is just a way of telling politicians That they suck and deserve to hear the truths that only rap can say
